metadata.name: The Journey - Abstract Painting
metadata.description:
This is an original physical abstract painting made with oil colours on canvas.

This artwork explores the idea that sometimes the best way to deal with distractions, while on our journey, is to avoid them at all cost. We usually react to situations and try to prove our point. But sometimes the best way is to keep a distance. Stay focus and keep going.

ADDITIONAL DETAILS: 
NFT: 4001 × 3341 px, PNG (28.4 MB) - 1 of 1 Edition 
Physical Painting Dimensions: 60 x 50 x 1.5cm

IMPORTANT NOTES: 
The first/original buyer of the NFT has the chance to claim the original artwork. Certificate of authenticity is included. Free Delivery Worldwide.
If you are buying on the secondary market you will not have the chance to claim the physical painting. There is only a chance to claim the physical painting, within the primary sale of the NFT.
